text: Sir Li Ka-shing"SUPPLEMENT No. 1 to Issue 55879", London Gazette, 19 June 2000, p. 24. (born 13 June 1928) is a Hong Kong businessman, investor, and philanthropist. As of June 2019, Li is the 30th richest person in the world. He has a wealth of US$29.4 billion. He is the senior advisor for CK Hutchison HoldingsCKH Senior Advisor and CK Asset Holdings, after he retired from the Chairman of the Board in May 2018; through it, he is the world's leading port investor, developer, and operator of the largest health and beauty retailer in Asia and Europe. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese philanthropists Category:Chinese businesspeople
title: Li Ka-shing
